mapper.select: SELECT K1.`SCHED_NAME` AS schedName, K1.`JOB_GROUP` AS jobGroup, K1.`JOB_NAME` AS jobName, K1.`JOB_CLASS_NAME` AS jobClassName, T.`TRIGGER_GROUP` AS triggerGroup, T.`TRIGGER_NAME` AS triggerName, T.`TIME_ZONE_ID` AS timeZoneId, T.`CRON_EXPRESSION` AS cronExpression, K.`TRIGGER_STATE` AS triggerState, K.`DESCRIPTION` AS description, K.`JOB_DATA` AS jobData FROM `QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS` T LEFT JOIN `QRTZ_TRIGGERS` K ON K.`SCHED_NAME` = T.`SCHED_NAME` AND K.`TRIGGER_GROUP` = T.`TRIGGER_GROUP` AND K.`TRIGGER_NAME` = T.`TRIGGER_NAME` LEFT JOIN `QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS` K1 ON K1.`SCHED_NAME` = K.`SCHED_NAME` AND K1.`JOB_GROUP` = K.`JOB_GROUP` AND K1.`JOB_NAME` = K.`JOB_NAME` WHERE T.`TRIGGER_NAME` = #{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
